attributes.action: UK Govt should decry caricature of Muhammad SAW
attributes.additional_details:
According to media Drawings will be judged by American cartoonist Bosch Fawstin, winner of a similar competition in Texas 3 years ago that was targeted by two gunmen.
Prophet Muhammad  is a beloved & venerated figure to Muslims, and "it is a human impulse to want to protect what's sacred to you."
We request UK to strictly take notice of such instigative attempt. Parliament should decry caricature of Muhammad SAW.Uk should take steps to stop any live or recorded telecast of blasphemous contest
attributes.background: Dutch anti-Islam politician Geert Wilders is to hold a Prophet Muhammad SAW ‘s cartoon competition at his party’s parliamentary offices.The Party for Freedom (PVV), has previously called for the Quran to be banned.
